protein.specific_function: Forms part of a macromolecular complex that catalyzes the attachment of specific amino acids to cognate tRNAs during protein synthesis. Modulates the secretion of AIMP1 and may be involved in generation of the inflammatory cytokine EMAP2 from AIMP1.

go_class.description: ligase activity, forming aminoacyl-trna and related compounds

reference.reference_text: Girjes AA, Hobson K, Chen P, Lavin MF: Cloning and characterization of cDNA encoding a human arginyl-tRNA synthetase. Gene. 1995 Oct 27;164(2):347-50.
